package for building the sources( ws_ant). I was able to use this to build our 
project which has 590 source files on windows without any issues. But, when i 
run the ws_ant script on Solaris, after 1-2 minutes, build fails with following

<javac> task, but no results.

Thanks in advance
Suvarna

1. Does the same problem arise with a recent version of ant from apache?
Specifically Ant1.5.3? 

2. what happens if you run javac from the command line? 

3. try running ant with more memory; you can do this in the apache versions with
something like.
setenv ANT_OPTS -Xmx500m

There could be trouble with one of the jars which is surfacing as an out of
memory error -imagine if something got corrupted in the transfer from windows to
unix.
